alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 10:46AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Walsh, Marshall, Grand Forks and Polk Counties. Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Walsh, Pembina, Marshall and Kittson Counties. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Pembina and Kittson Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Grand Forks and Polk Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Pembina. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 46.6 feet, MN 175 bridge (south of Pembina and north of Drayton) approaches flood (MN DOT). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 46.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 46.8 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 39.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
